EmailTemplate.description: If a household member / person on premise BRC consent is pending for more than 5 days, then this email is sent to remind the user that the document is pending
EmailTemplate.name: 70b - Signature of Household Member BRC consent Pending Reminder (< 18 yo)
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Early Education and Care - {!Household_Member__c.First_Name__c} {!Household_Member__c.Last_Name__c} BRC Consent Form is ready for signature - Reminder
